SEARCH:
Package ch.zhaw.spro.dbservices

Klasse EmployeeDbService

java.lang.Object
ch.zhaw.spro.dbservices.EmployeeDbService
@Service public class EmployeeDbService extends Object
This service provides an API for managing employees. It uses Spring annotations to handle HTTP requests and interacts with the EmployeeDbRepository.

The following operations are provided:

  • getAllEmployees(): Retrieve all employees from the database. Returns a list of employees.
  • getEmployeeById(ObjectId): Retrieve an employee by its ID. Returns an optional employee.
  • deleteEmployee(ObjectId): Delete an employee by its ID. Does not return a response.
  • addEmployee(Employee): Add a new employee to the database. Expects an employee object in the request body and returns the created employee.
  • and more...
